<<<<<<< HEAD
The beame of brightnesse. Or The three faire sisters of Christendome Containing: a disputation betweene the three famous citties in Europe. Viz. Venice, Paris and London, with their differences. Composed by William Venner, gentleman. Fennor, William.
[20] p.
Printed [by G. Eld] for Iohn Wright, and are to be sold at his shop in Newgate Market, neere Christ-church, At London : 1611.
In verse. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-B⁴ C² . Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
